titleStmt.title: A ioyfull medytacyon to all Englonde of the coronacyon of our moost naturall souerayne lorde kynge Henry the eyght
titleStmt.author: Hawes, Stephen, d. 1523?

publicationStmt.publisher: In the fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
